gdeltr2 0.3.118

Get V1 sentiment from specified domains

Source: R/gdelt_full_text_api.R
ft_urls_sentiment.Rd

Get V1 sentiment from specified domains

ft_urls_sentiment(domains = c("nytimes.com", "washingtonpost.com"),
  visualization = TRUE, term = NA, last_minutes = NA, is_tone = T,
  tone_less_than = NA, tone_more_than = NA, source_language = NA,
  sort_by = "date", dedeup_results = T, nest_data = F,
  return_message = T)

Arguments

domains

vector of domain names
visualization

if `TRUE` returns a ggplot2 visualization
term

specific term
last_minutes

how long
is_tone

use tone
tone_less_than

tone minimum
tone_more_than

tone maximum
source_language

vector search language
sort_by

sort by
dedeup_results

if `TRUE` dedupes results
nest_data

if `TRUE` returns nested data frame
return_message

if `TRUE` returns a messaage

Value

a `tibble` or a ggplot visualiation

Examples

ft_urls_sentiment(domains = c("foxnews.com", "cnn.com", "washingtonpost.com"), term = "Donald Trump", visualization = T)
#> Error in as_mapper(.f): object 'get_data_sentiment_ft_api' not found
